name: PRESS START The 5th Anniversary
summary:
A SHM-CD release. Tracks selected from the 2008 and 2009 concerts.

Persona 4
Music by Shoji Meguro
Arrangement by Kazuhiko Toyama
Soprano: Oriko Takahashi
Piano: Keita Egusa

Ys, Ys II
Music by Falcom Sound Team jdk (Yuzo Koshiro)
Arrangement by Kousuke Yamashita

Samurai Spirits
Music by TATE_NORIO
Arrangement by Nobuyuki Nakamura
Shamisen: Takemi Hirohara

Kamaitachi no Yoru, Otogirisou
Music by CHUNSOFT (Kouta Kato, Chiyoko Mitsumata)
Arrangement by Kazuhiko Toyama
Celesta: Keita Egusa

Spelunker
Music by Irem (Tim Martin)
Arrangement by Nobuyuki Nakamura

Suikoden
Music by Konami Kukeiha Club (Miki Higashino)
Arrangement by Kousuke Yamashita
Piano: Keita Egusa

Professor Layton and the Curious Village
Music by Tomohito Nishiura
Arrangement by Shuhei Kamimura

Okami
Music by Masami Ueda, Hiroshi Yamaguchi, JUN
Arrangement by Shuhei Kamimura
Shamisen, Hakuhachi: HIDE-HIDE (Hideki Ishigaki & Hideki Onoue)
Piano: Keita Egusa

Fantasy Zone
Music by Hiro
Arrangement by Nobuyuki Nakamura
Guitar: Haruo Kubota

Performed by
Kanagawa Philharmonic Orchestra (Tracks 2, 3, 5, 7)
Tokyo City Philharmonic Orchestra (Tracks 1, 4, 6, 8, 9)

Recorded at
Bunkamura Orchard Hall - September 14, 2008 (Tracks 2, 3, 5, 7)
Tokyo Metropolitan Art Space - August 2, 2009 (Tracks 1, 4, 6, 8, 9)
info:
• 作曲: 川口博史、古代祐三、目黒将司、西浦智仁
  • 编曲: 中村暢之、外山和彦、山下康介
  • 别名: プレススタート 5周年記念アルバム
  • 发售日期: 2010-09-11
  • 价格: 3150 JPY
  • 播放时长: 50:41
  • 碟片数量: 1
